title: What are the pros of information communication technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: The role of communication technology for individuals is to generate, organise and pass on information – whether it's for business communications or regular social interactions. Today it's not unusual for all communicating entities to employ some form of technology because it comes in handy in facilitating a smooth transfer of information. Advantages of Communication Technology: more efficient.faster method of cummunication during emergencies.able to communicate from anywhere in the world.long distance communication is easier.communication made easier.

The Pros of information technology are as follows: Gone are the days when communication throughout the world was a cumbersome process, but now everything is possible.It has helped in the creation of new jobs worldwide.The Source of entertainment has seen tremendous growth.It has made the world a global village
